Title: Paid in Full
Writer: Azie Faison Jr. (earlier screenplay), Austin Phillips (earlier screenplay), Matthew Cirulnick (screenplay), Thulani Davis (screenplay)
Actors: Wood Harris, Mekhi Phifer, Kevin Carroll, Esai Morales
Plot: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.
